details:
Brief introduction


* [CVE-2019-13390](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-13390)
rawenc: Only accept the appropriate stream type for raw muxers.
* [CVE-2019-17542](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-17542)
Heap-based buffer overflow in vqa\_decode\_chunk.
* [CVE-2020-13904](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2020-13904)
Use-after-free via a crafted EXTINF duration
 in an m3u8 file.


For Debian 9 stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
7:3.2.15-0+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your ffmpeg packages.


For the detailed security status of ffmpeg please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/ffmpeg>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
